body:
`spack install java` now fails with:
```
==> Fetching https://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/12.0.1+12/69cfe15208a647278a19ef0990eea691/jdk-12.0.1_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz
#################################################################################### 100.0% -=O=-#   #    #    #                                                                     
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
```

This is because Oracle just changed license terms.  You now need OpenJDK.  ALL version URLs in our current Spack package need to be changed:

https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk12-downloads-5295953.html

Has anyone else seen this yet?
title: New Oracle Licensing Terms
